definitions.definition: A particularly difficult question or puzzle.
Someone who asks a question or sets a problem.
definitions.example: Even as a child, she was a habitual poser of difficult questions.

definitions.definition: Someone who, or something which, poses; a person who sets their body in a fixed position, such as for photography or painting.
A poseur; someone who affects some behaviour, style, attitude or other condition, often to impress or influence others.
